author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 17 year old boy was killed in a road accident in Gudiyatham on Monday.

Police said Seema Hyder, a resident of Immam Bargar colony, Pasumathur, had gone to leave his sister in school in Gudiyatham. Hyder's friend Siraj Ali had taken them in his two-wheeler.

They were returning on Gudiyatham to Pallikonda road after dropping the girl in school when Hyder saw a friend coming in the opposite direction near Sedukarai.

He got down from the bike and crossed the stretch when a lorry coming in the opposite direction mowed him down. He succumbed to injuries on the spot. The driver of the lorry abandoned the vehicle. Police have confiscated the lorry. Gudiyatham Town police have registered a case.
title: Lorry mows down 17-year-old boy
